entry.title: Are conventional Indian universities competing at global level at all?

link.title: Are conventional Indian universities competing at global level at all?

entry.summary: If you see the NIRF’s India University 2023 ranking, you will see IISc on the top followed by JNU, JMI, AMU etc. Although I don’t consider IISc as a university because they only offer courses in science, thus, not a convectional university. But if you go to international ranks, for example, QS ranking, these universities do … Continue reading Are conventional Indian universities competing at global level at all?

entry.title: Another thing similar to dowsing…
entry.summary: We all understand that standard dowsing is fake. This one is particularly interesting. Few years ago News 18 went to a village in Rajasthan. In this dowsing, a person sits on a coconut and another person with a incense stick roams in the land where they need a borewell. Now the claim is that the … Continue reading Another thing similar to dowsing…

entry.title: LyX 2.3.6-1 docker container
entry.summary: I have created docker images for LyX 2.3.6-1. You can download and use LyX with full-texlive (~2GB) without wasting time to install LyX and texlive. The instructions to run the container can be found in the readme. Just run the first command with your pwd in project’s folder. I am planning to build the Docker image for 2.3.7 also, but … Continue reading LyX 2.3.6-1 docker container

entry.title: 42 days uptime on the daily driver.

link.title: 42 days uptime on the daily driver.

entry.title: Change the Dash to Dock App Launcher icon to a coloured icon

link.title: Change the Dash to Dock App Launcher icon to a coloured icon

entry.summary: I explored this tutorial which basically tells you a way to change the default GNOME app launcher icon. I was able to change the icon in ~/.icons/<icon_fodler/actions/symbolic. I just need to replace view-app-grid-symbolic.svg. But the icon is always black and white. I used svgs from this website: www.svgrepo.com/ For example, I choosed this Windows 7 svg. Here is what I … Continue reading Change the Dash to Dock App Launcher icon to a coloured icon

entry.title: Reached an uptime of 1 month
entry.summary: So, for the first time I reached an uptime of 1 month on my personal PC. The PC is just working fine, no lags, BSOD etc. Just working as if booted it.

entry.title: Found Charles Darwin hand written letters.

link.title: Found Charles Darwin hand written letters.

entry.summary: So, I went to nearby museum in Tenby, Wales. Found some hand written letters from Charles Darwin. TBH the letters are not readable after 200 years, but I have attached a transcript of the letter.

entry.title: Forced to star the repo to open an issue

link.title: Forced to star the repo to open an issue

entry.summary: So, I just wanted open an issue for problems with installation. The issue was automatically closed because I didn’t star the repo. So I figured out that they used this github action. How moral it is to ask people to star the repo before even using it? Comments: https://www.reddit.com/r/github/comments/16r53in/forced_to_star_the_repo_to_open_an_issue/

entry.title: Remmina finally connects to my uni’s PC

link.title: Remmina finally connects to my uni’s PC

entry.summary: So I have been struggling to connect to my university PC through RDP using remmina or any other RDP client on Linux. Last year I tried asked this question at lot of places and couldn’t find any solution. This includes posts on unix.stackexchange and askubuntu. It turns out that none of the RDP clients could communicate to Microsoft … Continue reading Remmina finally connects to my uni’s PC
